This is a special offer considering its worth to you and my desire to ensure you have the opportunity to experience its benefits. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer
